wiki.summary: On “LOVE YOU BETTER,” Future talks about the vulnerability he feels after breaking up with someone, mentioning how she needs to find another person who loves her and treats her better than him. The song features a chopped-vocal sample of singer Jayla Darden’s song, “Idea 686,” released in August 2018. Read more on Last.fm.
